Posts.Content: Thought this had already been posted on this Group BUT apparently not SO -please accept this as an invite to come along to York on the 9th September to an informal meet-up of others on the site for a chat/drink/moan at the world!! We are meeting in the Windmill Pub in Blossom Street, York from 12noon on the 9th September. It's a chance to chat freely with others, from many other groups as well, in a relaxed way and makes a wonderful change from Hospital Appointments etc. ALL WELCOME BE YOU DIAGNOSED/PARTNERS/CARERS ETC ETC.Â  Please contact myself or Gragon (who is organising this) - he's on the Incurable Group- to let us know you are coming and we will give you telephone numbers etc for on the day. Love and Hugs to ALL Diz xxxx
Posts.Title: YORK MEET-UP 9TH SEPTEMBER 2017
